full_summary:
### TBIPS - Project Delivery Services with Multiple Resource Categories
#### Solicitation Number: 23-58028

The National Research Council (NRC) has released a request for proposal (RFP) for Project Delivery Services with Multiple Resource Categories as part of the TBIPS (Technology, Business Platforms and Innovative Systems Procurement Services) contract.

**Key Dates:**

* Publication Date: 12th June 2023
* Closing Date: 10th July 2023 (14:00:00 EDT)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 14th July 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: 30th June 2025

**Notice Details:**

* Solicitation Number: 23-58028
* Reference Number: CB-6356-52361003
* Amendment Number: 3
* Tender Status: Expiré
* Unspsc: 80101507 - Information Technology Consultation Services
* Regions of Opportunity: Ottawa
* Procurement Method: Competitive-Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements:**

This solicitation may be governed by the following Free Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Contact Information:**

* Mr. Philippe G. Cléroux
* Phone: 613-998-1073
* Email: philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6, Canada

### Service Requirements

The National Research Council is seeking the services of technical professionals with expertise in IM/IT related projects on an "as and when needed" basis. Such services include:

* Business Analyst
* Technical Architect
* Enterprise Architect
* IT Security Design Specialist

For further information and the detailed tender description, please refer to the Solicitation Document, available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
